scripts.build: npm run build-core && npm run build-ssg
scripts.publish-core: cd packages/retend && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publish-ssg: cd packages/retend-server && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.publish-all: npm run publish-core && npm run publish-ssg && npm run publish-start
scripts.previews: cp README.md packages/retend/README.md && npx pkg-pr-new publish './packages/retend' './packages/retend-server' './packages/retend-start'
